parameters: Hi, Charles... what a lovely abode you have?
Better than the house we got, which is quite
Thanks, been in here since I was a wee lad!
Been in here since I was a wee lad.
...Silvon, this guy is giving me the creeps...
TAKE WHATEVER YOU WANT FROM THE BACK! Don't
need it anymore, haha. Just watch out for the
creepy rats! They sure do bite, shoot dang!
Uh, yeah, those weren't quite rats, though.
Those coil rats will fool ya! Don't let em'
THEY'LL BITE! THEY BITE HARD, SHOOT DANG!
They bite... watch your toes, explorers!
I think I remember this poor fellow from my
Middle School class... let's go, please.
Oh, how lovely... there's a prison cell here.
I don't think I... well, okay, I honestly do
You found a switch in the fireplace! You flipped it on.
You... flipped it back to off.
Why would we flip it off...?
Seems you have to find a switch before you can open it...
You don't want to ask what's inside of there.
You found... persimmons. Not tomatoes. Oh well...
Oooh, you looked inside of his pee vase!
I dunno, just feels fitting for the current
What a ragged, torn apart bed.
You got... oh, it's just his clothes.
I suppose he always liked leaks...
